visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts heatmap chart with the following specifications: Chart type is heatmap, chart title is 'Conditional Tooltip', axes and labels styling includes black color for null values, data series includes a single series with specific data points, custom colors are not specified, and additional configurations include a subtitle and a custom tooltip formatter.

subtitle.text: The black (null) point has custom tooltip, the others default

tooltip.formatter: function (tooltip) { if (this.point.value === null) { return 'Null'; } return tooltip.defaultFormatter.call(this, tooltip); }

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a heatmap chart with a specific focus on conditional tooltips. The chart type is set to 'heatmap', and the title is 'Conditional Tooltip'. The subtitle provides additional context about the custom tooltip behavior for null values. The plotOptions specify that null values in the heatmap should be colored black. The colorAxis is configured to range from 0 to 9, which corresponds to the data values. The tooltip formatter function checks if the point value is null and returns 'Null' for such points, otherwise it uses the default tooltip formatter. The data series includes a single series with specific data points arranged in a 3x3 grid, with one of the points having a null value to demonstrate the custom tooltip behavior.
